attributes.action: lower the cost of all train fare and lower the minimum age for adult prices 18
attributes.background: Students travelling to and from school everyday are subject to high prices which they cannot continually pay for, also leads to people having to travel without paying or using a child ticket

rejection.details:
Sorry - we cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104577

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
